parameters.name: Bitmap
parameters.description: Label type as defined in swControlBitmapLabelType_e

title: IPropertyManagerPageControl.SetStandardPictureLabel
description: Sets the bitmap's or PNG image's label for this control on a PropertyManager page.

parameters.name: Bitmap
parameters.description: Label type as defined in swControlBitmapLabelType_e

returns: True if successful, false if not
remarks: You can only use this method on a PropertyManager page before the page is displayed, while it is displayed, or when it is closed.

examples.title: Cut Body in Half Using Macro Feature (VBA)
